EmailTemplate.subject: Join the Pivotal HD Community Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join the Community. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As a reminder Pivotal HD Community is supported by you – the Community. If you have any questions, comments, best practices that you would like to share, etc. please join our community discussion forum <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>.
Interested in learning more? Visit our most recent blog posts for Pivotal insight around Hadoop and Pivotal HD:
>> Cultivating Hybrids: 4 Key Data Architectures for Scaling Infinitely <http://blog.gopivotal.com/features/cultivating-hybrids-4-key-data-architectures-for-scaling-infinitely> One of the members of our advanced field engineering group shares how four types of systems—Hadoop, massively parallel processing (MPP) databases, NewSQL, and NoSQL—can be combined to achieve infinite scale.
>> Large-Scale Video Analytics on Hadoop <http://blog.gopivotal.com/features/large-scale-video-analytics-on-hadoop> Currently, the most popular Big Data modalities are centered around structured data. But recently, unstructured data from video and images demand much more attention in the current Big Data market, and the Pivotal Data Science team is helping to make gaining insight from this high volume, high velocity type of data a reality that will ease the burden for security teams, speed traffic analysis and even make true video search possible.
Questions? Contact us <mailto:info@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you,
